data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna 182 Skylane RG II Add-On
data.detailed_description:
The Cessna 182 Skylane is an American four-seat, single-engined light airplane, built by Cessna. First brought to market in 1956 as a tricycle gear variant of the 180, one year later the Cessna 182A was introduced, the first to carry the Skylane name. It went on to be a highly successful aircraft with over 23,000 built and still in production to this day.

Carenado’s Cessna 182 Skylane II for FSX: Steam Edition is a detailed rendition of this aircraft which comes with four paint schemes. Details include pitot pressure chamber, antennas, chocks, and pitot tube cover.

Features:

  • External dynamic shadows, internal dynamic shadows on VC, normal mapping, specular mapping and bloom lights
  • Polygon optimized model
  • 4 paint schemes
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, retracting gears, rolling wheels
  • 3D modelled pilot and cockpit area
  • Many details as: pitot pressure chamber, antennas, chocks, pitot tube cover
  • Custom panel and gauges
  • Nightlight effects on panel
  • Similar behaviour compared to the real airplane
  • Real weight and balance
  • Normal and Emergency Checklist
  • Panel Manual
  • Performance tables

data.short_description: The Cessna 182 Skylane is an American four-seat, single-engined light airplane, built by Cessna. First brought to market in 1956 as a tricycle gear variant of the 180, one year later the Cessna 182A was introduced, the first to carry the Skylane name.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos

data.legal_notice: Cessna 182 Skylane RG II is a trademark of Textron Innovations and is used under license to RailSimulator.com Ltd d/b/a/ Dovetail Games.
